subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Atlanta Thrashers goalie Ondrej Pavelec, who collapsed during a season-opening win over Washington on Friday, has a concussion and was hospitalized undergoing further tests.
snippet: Atlanta Thrashers goalie Ondrej Pavelec, who collapsed during a season-opening win over Washington on Friday, has a concussion and was hospitalized undergoing further tests.
